enabled.description: Indicated whether to track block depth of message for confirmation

interval.description: Interval in miliseconds to check blockdepth of message

maxBlockDepth.description: Block depth after which a message is confirmed and not tracked anymore

updateEachBlock.description: Indicates if block depth should be updated in data store for each block, otherwise only when confirmed

name.description: The name by which the blockchain is identified in the software and in loggings

module.description: The name of the source code module in `./lib/blockchains` without the `.js` extention

active.description: Indicates whether the blockchain is active or can be ignored

testnet.description: Indicates whether the blockchain network is used for testing

createAccount.description: Indicates whether an account for the blockchain should be autiomatically created if none exists

blockRetrievalInterval.description: The time in miliseconds before the blockchain listener tries to retireve the next block

blockRetrievalStart.description: The block number from which to start scanning blocks for Whiteflag messages; if 0 the blockchain will be scanned from the beginning

blockRetrievalEnd.description: The block number to which to scan blocks for Whiteflag messages; if 0 the blockchain will be scanned to the end

blockRetrievalRestart.description: The maximum number of blocks to look back at startup if behind the highest block

blockMaxRetries.description: The number of retries if a specific block cannot be retrieved before going to the next block

transactionBatchSize.description: The number of transactions in a block to be processed in parallel

transactionValue.description: The standard value of a Whietflag message transaction

traceRawTransaction.description: Indicates if trace logs should include all steps of the prcessing of a single transaction

rpcProtocol.description: The network protocol used to make an RPC connection with the blockchain node

rpcHost.description: The hostname of the blockchain node to make an RPC connection

rpcPort.description: The network port used by the blockchain node to make an RPC connection

rpcUsername.description: The username required to connect to the blockchain node to make an RPC connection

rpcPassword.description: The password required to connect to the blockchain node to make an RPC connection
